title: How can I change language from Korean to English
body: I lived in Korea, and I wanted to play in English. With the new client it's impossible.

replies.body: Each region has their own set of languages that it's limited to.  For example, NA currently only support English while EU may have quite a few more.  You can check out our [language ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language)guide for a list of supported languages.  We don't support modifying game files to make your own language packs, so trying to do that is at your own risk and may cause problems.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Well, it is kinda sad for a game as huge as League of Legends to not be able to change the language between regions, but to even warn players that there may be consequences if someone doesn't understand the language and wants to change it with a third party or by altering the files cause you as game developers are unable to, it's even sadder. But hey, let's rather have some more skins than full language support so that more players could enjoy this game :^) (Oh, I know there are two different departments, was just a satire as how any other department than the graphic design and sometimes the balance team is doing next to nothing to improve playing experience)
